attributes.action: Block a government bailout of Virgin Atlantic Airlines.
attributes.additional_details: We would like the government to block any such financial bailout and divert any availabile money to fighting covid-19.
attributes.background: Due to the global pandemic Covid-19 and subsequent drastic fall in transatlantic air travel, Virgin Atlantic have requested billions in government bailouts to sustain their business despite their billionaire founder.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302992

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
